meta.title: Binbang – Vacancy Alert Service
meta.description: Binbang monitors accommodation booking sites for vacancies and sends email alerts. When you sign in with Google we use your email only for account identification and sending alerts.
meta.twitterDescription: Vacancy alerts checked every minute. We notify you when a room becomes available.

hero.headline: So your rest never loses its way,
hero.subheadline: Binbang keeps the lighthouse on all night.
hero.description: Tired of endless refreshing? Binbang keeps watch while you sleep and catches the vacancy at your dream stay first.
hero.aboutApp: Binbang is a vacancy alert service; when you sign in with Google we use your email only for account identification and sending alerts.

features.f1Desc: Browser optimization finds open rooms up to 4x faster than conventional checks. Be the first to know and secure your perfect stay ahead of everyone else.
features.f2Desc: Dynamic selectors adapt to booking-site UI changes without redeploying code. Even when platforms evolve, Binbang's vision never loses its way.
features.f3Subtitle: Steadfast protection, even while you sleep
features.f3Desc: Minute-level heartbeat logs keep monitoring stable and transparent, all day. The system detects and recovers from any issues automatically, so your watch never ends.

trust.title: Live Operations
trust.emptyLogs: No system activity in the last 5 minutes.
trust.errorMessage: Failed to load live status. Retrying in 5 seconds.

footer.title: We handle the complexity.
footer.description: You can focus on planning your next trip.

appPurpose: Binbang is a vacancy alert service that monitors accommodation booking sites and sends email notifications when a room becomes available. When you sign in with Google, we use your email address only for account identification and sending vacancy alerts.
